data.es: 'O lord of monkeys from now on, you alone will be his father, provider of everything, saviour and protector in danger.

data.v: एष तारात्मजः श्रीमांस्त्वया तुल्यपराक्रमः । रक्षसां तु वधे तेषामग्रतस्ते भविष्यति ।।
data.es: 'This prosperous son of Tara, your equal in valour, will remain with you in the forefront to crush demons.

data.v: अनुरूपाणि कर्माणि विक्रम्य बलवान्रणे । करिष्यत्येष तारेयस्तरस्वी तरुणोऽङ्गदः ।।
data.es: 'This mighty hero Angada, son of Tara, is young and dynamic. He will strike (the enemy) in a fitting manner in war.

data.v: सुषेणदुहिता चेयमर्थसूक्ष्मविनिश्चये । औत्पातिके च विविधे सर्वतः परिनिष्ठिता ।।
data.es: 'Tara, daughter of Sushena, is wise and efficient in discerning subtle matters and in foreseeing unexpected events.

data.v: यदेषा साध्विति ब्रूयात्कार्यं तन्मुक्तसंशयम् । न हि तारामतं किंचिदन्यथा परिवर्तते ।।
data.es: 'Tara's opinion is never wrong. It does not change. Whatever she speaks is right and should be carried out without any doubt.

data.v: राघवस्य च ते कार्यं कर्तव्यमविशङ्कया । स्यादधर्मो ह्यकरणे त्वां च हिंस्याद्विमानितः ।।
data.es: 'You ought to carry out Rama's work without hesitation. If you do not, it will be unrighteous and harmful.

data.v: इमां च मालामाधत्स्व दिव्यां सुग्रीवकाञ्चनीम् । उदारा श्रीः स्थिता ह्यस्यां संप्रजह्यान्मृते मयि ।।
data.es: 'O Sugriva put on this divine golden necklace. It has great brilliance. Its present lustre may be gone when I am dead.'

data.v: इत्येवमुक्तः सुग्रीवो वालिना भ्रातृसौहृदात् । हर्षं त्यक्त्वा पुनर्दीनो ग्रहग्रस्त इवोडुराट् ।।
data.es: Thus spoken to by Vali with brotherly affection, Sugriva gave up joy (of victory) and appeared dull like the Moon eclipsed by planet Rahu.

data.v: तद्वालिवचनाच्छान्तः कुर्वन्युक्तमतन्द्रितः । जग्राह सोऽभ्यनुज्ञातो मालां तां चैव काञ्चनीम् ।।
data.es: On hearing Vali's words, Sugriva became composed with no illfeeling. Considering it to be proper, he received with his permission the golden necklace.

data.v: तां मालां काञ्चनीं दत्त्वा वाली दृष्ट्वात्मजं स्थितम् । संसिद्धः प्रेत्य भावाय स्नेहादङ्गदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Having given the golden necklace to Sugriva,Vali, feeling ready to depart, looked at his son Angada who stood by and spoke affectionately:

data.v: देशकालौ भजस्वाद्य क्षममाणः प्रियाप्रिये । सुखदुःखसहः काले सुग्रीववशगो भव ।।
data.es: 'Enduring pleasure or pain equally with due regard to time and place favourable to you or otherwise, you should submit to the will of Sugriva.

data.v: यथा हि त्वं महाबाहो लालितः सततं मया । न तथा वर्तमानं त्वां सुग्रीवो बहु मंस्यते ।।
data.es: 'O longarmed one you have always been affectionately brought up by me. Sugriva may not rear you that way.

data.v: मास्यामित्रैर्गतं गच्छेर्मा शत्रुभिररिंदम । भर्तुरर्थपरो दान्तः सुग्रीववशगो भव ।।
data.es: 'O conqueror of foes do not align with his enemies or with the friends of his enemies. Remain selfrestrained and loyal to Sugriva. Be subordinate to his will.

data.v: न चातिप्रणयः कार्यः कर्तव्योऽप्रणयश्च ते । उभयं हि महादोषं तस्मादन्तरदृग्भव ।।
data.es: 'You are not to be excessively friendly or otherise as both are serious mistakes. Therefore, be insightful.'

data.v: इत्युक्त्वाथ विवृत्ताक्षः शरसंपीडितो भृशम् । विवृतैर्दशनैर्भीमैर्बभूवोत्क्रान्तजीवितः ।।
data.es: Having spoken this, tormented by the arrow, eyes popping out and his dreadful teeth ejected, Vali remained drained of life.

data.v: हते तु वीरे प्लवगाधिपे तदा; प्लवंगमास्तत्र न शर्म लेभिरे । वनेचराः सिंहयुते महावने; यथा हि गावो निहते गवां पतौ ।।
data.es: Just as the cattle get frightened when the leader of the herd gets killed in a huge forest full of lions, the young monkey became puzzled when the chief of monkeys got killed.

data.v: ततस्तु तारा व्यसनार्णव प्लुता; मृतस्या भर्तुर्वदनं समीक्ष्य सा । जगाम भूमिं परिरभ्य वालिनं; महाद्रुमं छिन्नमिवाश्रिता लता ।।
ततः समुपजिघ्रन्ती कपिराजस्य तन्मुखम् । पतिं लोकाच्च्युतं तारा मृतं वचनमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Tara kissed (smelt) the forehead of the king of monkeys who had departed and said:

data.v: शेषे त्वं विषमे दुःखमकृत्वा वचनं मम । उपलोपचिते वीर सुदुःखे वसुधातले ।।
data.es: 'O hero, not caring for my words (of caution), you are now lying with great pain on hard stones on the ground.

data.v: मत्तः प्रियतरा नूनं वानरेन्द्र मही तव । शेषे हि तां परिष्वज्य मां च न प्रतिभाषसे ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys you lie in the end, embracing the earth and not replying to me. Surely you deem this earth dearer than me.

data.v: सुग्रीव एव विक्रान्तो वीर साहसिक प्रिय । ऋक्षवानरमुख्यास्त्वां बलिनं पर्युपासते ।।
एषां विलपितं कृच्छ्रमङ्गदस्य च शोचतः । मम चेमां गिरं श्रुत्वा किं त्वं न प्रतिबुध्यसे ।।
data.es: 'Oh powerful Vali leaders of the bears and monkeys, the entire lot are standing near you, wailing. Angada has been crying in grief. How is it that you are not rising up even after hearing their wailing voices and my call? .

data.v: इदं तच्छूरशयनं यत्र शेषे हतो युधि । शायिता निहता यत्र त्वयैव रिपवः पुरा ।।
data.es: 'Earlier you have killed enemies in combats and made them lie down where now you lie.

data.v: विशुद्धसत्त्वाभिजन प्रिययुद्ध मम प्रिय । मामनाथां विहायैकां गतस्त्वमसि मानद ।।
data.es: 'O venerable hero, born in a pure and noble family, you are a lover of battles. Now you have left me an orphan.

data.v: शूराय न प्रदातव्या कन्या खलु विपश्चिता । शूरभार्यां हतां पश्य सद्यो मां विधवां कृताम् ।।
data.es: 'It is said by wise men that a girl should not be given in marriage to a warrior. See me, the wife of a warrior, now rendered a widow.

data.v: अवभग्नश्च मे मानो भग्ना मे शाश्वती गतिः । अगाधे च निमग्नास्मि विपुले शोकसागरे ।।
data.es: 'My pride is crushed. My husband, the ultimate resort for me is shattered.I am plunged in a vast, bottomless ocean of grief.

data.v: अश्मसारमयं नूनमिदं मे हृदयं दृढम् । भर्तारं निहतं दृष्ट्वा यन्नाद्य शतधा गतम् ।।
data.es: 'My heart is surely made of hard stone yet it has not split into a hundred pieces even on seeing my husband slain৷৷

data.v: सुहृच्चैव हि भर्ता च प्रकृत्या च मम प्रियः । आहवे च पराक्रान्तः शूरः पञ्चत्वमागतः ।।
data.es: 'He was my husband, my friend and naturally my loving king. He was powerful in battle.Alas the hero has died.

data.v: पतिहीना तु या नारी कामं भवतु पुत्रिणी । धनधान्यैः सुपूर्णापि विधवेत्युच्यते बुधैः ।।
data.es: 'Even if a woman without husband, is blessed with sons and abundant wealth and grain, still learned people call her a widow.

data.v: स्वगात्रप्रभवे वीर शेषे रुधिरमण्डले । कृमिरागपरिस्तोमे त्वमेवं शयने यथा ।।
data.es: 'O hero how is it that you are lying in a crimson bed of the pool of blood flowing from your body?

data.v: रेणुशोणितसंवीतं गात्रं तव समन्ततः । परिरब्धुं न शक्नोमि भुजाभ्यां प्लवगर्षभ ।।
data.es: 'O bull among monkeys how can I embrace you with my arms as your body is covered with dust particles and blood?.

data.v: कृतकृत्योऽद्य सुग्रीवो वैरेऽस्मिन्नतिदारुणे । यस्य रामविमुक्तेन हृतमेकेषुणा भयम् ।।
data.es: 'Sugriva has achieved his goal in his dreadful enmity (with you). His fear is dispelled by a single arrow released by Rama.

data.v: शरेण हृदि लग्नेन गात्रसंस्पर्शने तव । वार्यामि त्वां निरीक्षन्ती त्वयि पञ्चत्वमागते ।।
data.es: 'The arrow which has pierced your body prevents me from embracing you. I am only looking at you lying (not removing the arrow lest you die).'

data.v: उद्बबर्ह शरं नीलस्तस्य गात्रगतं तदा । गिरिगह्वरसंलीनं दीप्तमाशीविषं यथा ।।
data.es: Then Nila took out the arrow from Vali's heart with due effort as one would pull out a glowing serpent hidden in the mountain cave.

data.v: तस्य निष्कृष्यमाणस्य बाणस्य च बभौ द्युतिः । अस्तमस्तकसंरुद्धो रश्मिर्दिनकरादिव ।।
data.es: As the arrrow(drenched in blood) was being pulled out, its glow looked like the Sun's rays obstructed by the peak of the western mountain.

data.v: पेतुः क्षतजधारास्तु व्रणेभ्यस्तस्य सर्वशः । ताम्रगैरिकसंपृक्ता धारा इव धराधरात् ।।
data.es: The streams of blood that flowed all over from the wounds of his body appeared like streams of water mixed with red and copper colour.

data.v: अवकीर्णं विमार्जन्ती भर्तारं रणरेणुना । अस्रैर्नयनजैः शूरं सिषेचास्त्रसमाहतम् ।।
data.es: She (Tara) wiped the body wounded with the weapon and covered with wardust, sprinkling her tear drops from her eyes.

data.v: रुधिरोक्षितसर्वाङ्गं दृष्ट्वा विनिहतं पतिम् । उवाच तारा पिङ्गाक्षं पुत्रमङ्गदमङ्गना ।।
data.es: Turning to the body of her husband fully drenched in blood, thus spoke Tara to her tawnyeyed son Angada:

data.v: अवस्थां पश्चिमां पश्य पितुः पुत्र सुदारुणाम् । संप्रसक्तस्य वैरस्य गतोऽन्तः पापकर्मणा ।।
data.es: 'O son you see the most terrific end of your father on whom enmity forced sinful deeds.

data.v: बालसूर्योदयतनुं प्रयान्तं यमसादनम् । अभिवादय राजानं पितरं पुत्र मानदम् ।।
data.es: 'O son offer salutations to your venerable father, the king, departing for the abode of Yama (lord of death) looking (red with blood) like the rising Sun.'

data.v: एवमुक्तः समुत्थाय जग्राह चरणौ पितुः । भुजाभ्यां पीनवृताभ्यामङ्गदोऽहमिति ब्रुवन् ।।
data.es: Thus advised by Tara, Angada got up, clasped his father's feet with his stout arms, and saluted, saying, 'I am Angada.'

data.v: अभिवादयमानं त्वामङ्गदं त्वं यथापुरा । दीर्घायुर्भव पुत्रेति किमर्थं नाभिभाषसे ।।
data.es: 'Why do you not, with the words 'May you live long'', bless, as before, your son Angada who is greeting you? (said Tara).

data.v: अहं पुत्रसहाया त्वामुपासे गतचेतनम् । सिंहेन निहतं सद्यो गौः सवत्सेव गोवृषम् ।।
data.es: 'Just like a cow followed by its calf would attend upon a mighty bull struck by a lion I will wait with my son upon you who have lost consciousness (died).

data.v: इष्ट्वा संग्रामयज्ञेन नानाप्रहरणाम्भसा । अस्मिन्नवभृथे स्नातः कथं पत्न्या मया विना ।।
data.es: 'You have performed a warsacrifice. You have bathed in the waters of Rama's weapon signifying the end of the sacrifice. How did you take this customary bath without me, your wife?

data.v: या दत्ता देवराजेन तव तुष्टेन संयुगे । शातकुम्भमयीं मालां तां ते पश्यामि नेह किम् ।।
data.es: 'Why do I not see on your chest the golden necklace gifted by the king of the gods (Indra), pleased with you in the battle?

data.v: राजश्रीर्न जहाति त्वां गतासुमपि मानद । सूर्यस्यावर्तमानस्य शैलराजमिव प्रभा ।।
data.es: 'O venerable one, even though life has departed from you, kingly glory does not leave you any more than the light of the setting son leaves the king of mountains. (western mountain)

data.v: न मे वचः पथ्यमिदं त्वया कृतं; न चास्मि शक्ता हि निवारणे तव । हता सपुत्रास्मि हतेन संयुगे; सह त्वया श्रीर्विजहाति मामिह ।।
data.es: 'You have not followed my advice. I did not have the capacity to prevent you from going to war. The result is, you are killed and I am ruined along with my son. The goddess of fortune also is deserting me as well as your son.'इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये किष्किन्धाकाण्डे त्रयोविंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentythird sarga of Kishkindakanda of the Holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.

data.v: गतासुं वालिनं दृष्ट्वा राघवस्तदनन्तरम् । अब्रवीत्प्रश्रितं वाक्यं सुग्रीवं शत्रुतापनः ।।
data.es: Sugriva, the noblest of all monkeys, spoke these polite words in a pleasing manner to Lakshmana of terrific strength:

data.v: न शोकपरितापेन श्रेयसा युज्यते मृतः । यदत्रानन्तरं कार्यं तत्समाधातुमर्हथ ।।
data.es: 'No lamentation revives the dead. So you should take up whatever is required now.

data.v: लोकवृत्तमनुष्ठेयं कृतं वो बाष्पमोक्षणम् । न कालादुत्तरं किंचित्कर्म शक्यमुपासितुम् ।।
data.es: 'You have to go the worldly way. You have shed tears enough. Time is passing. You cannot perform the funeral after the lapse of appropriate time.

data.v: नियतः कारणं लोके नियतिः कर्मसाधनम् । नियतिः सर्वभूतानां नियोगेष्विह कारणम् ।।
data.es: 'Fate is the cause of the world. Fate is the means of accomplishment. Fate assigns duties to all beings.

data.v: न कर्ता कस्यचित्कश्चिन्नियोगे चापि नेश्वरः । स्वभावे वर्तते लोकस्तस्य कालः परायणम् ।।
data.es: 'No one can control another's action. No one including God can be the agent of action. No one has the power to entrust duty to others. This entire world is governed by one's own nature. Nature in turn is governed by Time (fate).

data.v: न कालः कालमत्येति न कालः परिहीयते । स्वभावं वा समासाद्य न कश्चिदतिवर्तते ।।
data.es: 'God (though independent) does not deviate from Time. Time cannot be escaped or trangressed. It cannot be condoned or avoided. No one can transgress their own nature.

data.v: न कालस्यास्ति बन्धुत्वं न हेतुर्न पराक्रमः । न मित्रज्ञातिसंबन्धः कारणं नात्मनो वशः ।।
data.es: 'Time has no consideration for relationship, friendship, or kinship or valour. Time itself is the cause. It is never under one's control.

data.v: किं तु काल परीणामो द्रष्टव्यः साधु पश्यता । धर्मश्चार्थश्च कामश्च कालक्रमसमाहिताः ।।
data.es: 'However a wise man should visualise the turn of events in course of time with the right vision. Dharma, artha and kama are controlled by an order laid down by Time.

data.v: इतः स्वां प्रकृतिं वाली गतः प्राप्तः क्रियाफलम् । धर्मार्थकामसंयोगैः पवित्रं प्लवगेश्वर ।।
data.es: 'Vali, king of monkeys is dead and gone. He acted according to his own nature and attained the sacred fruit of his action comensurate with dharma, wealth and pleasures in this world.

data.v: स्वधर्मस्य च संयोगाज्जितस्तेन महात्मना । स्वर्गः परिगृहीतश्च प्राणानपरिरक्षता ।।
data.es: 'Great Vali has earned a place in heaven by virtue of his own dharma and not caring for his own life .He has got the heavenly position he earned.

data.v: एषा वै नियतिः श्रेष्ठा यां गतो हरियूथपः । तदलं परितापेन प्राप्तकालमुपास्यताम् ।।
data.es: 'The state attained by the chief of monkeys is an excellent one.Therefore there is no need to regret. Attend to your duties (relating to rites)'

data.v: वचनान्ते तु रामस्य लक्ष्मणः परवीरहा । अवदत्प्रश्रितं वाक्यं सुग्रीवं गतचेतसं ।।
data.es: Seeing Sugriva had lost his senses, Lakshmana, the slayer of enemy warriors humbly said at the end of Rama's address:

data.v: कुरु त्वमस्य सुग्रीव प्रेतकार्यमनन्तरम् । ताराङ्गदाभ्यां सहितो वालिनो दहनं प्रति ।।
data.es: 'O Sugriva perform with Tara and Angada the funeral obsequies relating to the cremation of Vali.

data.v: समाज्ञापय काष्ठानि शुष्काणि च बहूनि च । चन्दनानि च दिव्यानि वालिसंस्कारकारणात् ।।
data.es: 'Let the best of dry logs and sandalwood be ordered for the funeral rites of Vali.

data.v: समाश्वासय चैनं त्वमङ्गदं दीनचेतसं । मा भूर्बालिशबुद्धिस्त्वं त्वदधीनमिदं पुरम् ।।
data.es: 'Pacify the despondent Angada so that he does not entertain childish thoughts any more. This city is under your control (now).

data.v: अङ्गदस्त्वानयेन्माल्यं वस्त्राणि विविधानि च । घृतं तैलमथो गन्धान्यच्चात्र समनन्तरम् ।।
data.es: 'Let Angada for his part collect garlands of many kinds, clothes, clarified butter, oil, fragrants and all that is required to be procured.

data.v: त्वं तार शिबिकां शीघ्रमादायागच्छ संभ्रमात् । त्वरा गुणवती युक्ता ह्यस्मिन्काले विशेषतः ।।
data.es: 'O Tara quickly get a swiftmoving litter fastened with ropes specially suitable for this occasion.

data.v: सज्जीभवन्तु प्लवगाः शिबिकावाहनोचिताः । समर्था बलिनश्चैव निर्हरिष्यन्ति वालिनम् ।।
data.es: 'Let those who are strong and capable among the monkeys be ready to carry the dead body of Vali on a litter'.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु सुग्रीवं सुमित्रानन्दवर्धनः । तस्थौ भ्रातृसमीपस्थो लक्ष्मणः परवीरहा ।।
data.es: Having thus spoken to Sugriva, Lakshmana, son of Sumitra, slayer of enemies, stood by his brother

data.v: लक्ष्मणस्य वचः श्रुत्वा तारः संभ्रान्तमानसः । प्रविवेश गुहां शीघ्रं शिबिकासक्तमानसः ।।
data.es: On hearing Lakshmana, Tara in an excited state quickly entered the cave city to get the litter.

data.v: आदाय शिबिकां तारः स तु पर्यापयत्पुनः । वानरैरुह्यमानां तां शूरैरुद्वहनोचितैः ।।
data.es: Tara jumped in on to the litter carried by strong monkeys.

data.v: ततो वालिनमुद्यम्य सुग्रीवः शिबिकां तदा । आरोपयत विक्रोशन्नङ्गदेन सहैव तु ।।
data.es: Then Sugriva along with Angada, crying aloud bitterly, lifted the body (of Vali) and placed it on the palanquin.

data.v: आरोप्य शिबिकां चैव वालिनं गतजीवितम् । अलंकारैश्च विविधैर्माल्यैर्वस्त्रैश्च भूषितम् ।।
data.es: Vali's deadbody was placed on the palanquin, decorated with many ornaments, garlands and clothes

data.v: आज्ञापयत्तदा राजा सुग्रीवः प्लवगेश्वरः । और्ध्वदेहिकमार्यस्य क्रियतामनुरूपतः ।।
data.es: King Sugriva, lord of the monkeys, said, 'Let the funeral rites of my noble sire be performed in a fitting manner'.

data.v: विश्राणयन्तो रत्नानि विविधानि बहूनि च । अग्रतः प्लवगा यान्तु शिबिका तदनन्तरम् ।।
data.es: 'Let the monkeys march in front, showering many different gems in large quantities and let the palanquin follow.

data.v: राज्ञामृद्धिविशेषा हि दृश्यन्ते भुवि यादृशाः । तादृशं वालिनः क्षिप्रं प्राकुर्वन्नौर्ध्वदेहिकम् ।।
data.es: 'Let the monkeys perform the funeral rites of our lord in an honourable way as expensively as has been done with regard to the obsequies of kings who ruled over this land.

data.v: अङ्गदमप्रिगृह्याशु तारप्रभृतयस्तथा । क्रोशन्तः प्रययुः सर्वे वानरा हतबान्धवाः ।।
data.es: Tara, Angada and the other bereaved monkeys hastened to perform the funeral ceremony of Valiweeping.

data.v: ताराप्रभृतयः सर्वा वानर्यो हतयूथपाः । अनुजग्मुर्हि भर्तारं क्रोशन्त्यः करुणस्वनाः ।।
data.es: Tara along with other female monkeys followed their lord, crying pathetically.

data.v: तासां रुदितशब्देन वानरीणां वनान्तरे । वनानि गिरयः सर्वे विक्रोशन्तीव सर्वतः ।।
data.es: When the female monkeys were weeping in the midst of the forest, it looked as if the forest and the hills were also mourning.

data.v: पुलिने गिरिनद्यास्तु विविक्ते जलसंवृते । चितां चक्रुः सुबहवो वानरा वनचारिणः ।।
data.es: Tormented with tears, the monkeys prepared in a solitary place surrounded by waters a pyre on the sandbank of a mountain stream.

data.v: अवरोप्य ततः स्कन्धाच्छिबिकां वहनोचिताः । तस्थुरेकान्तमाश्रित्य सर्वे शोकसमन्विताः ।।
data.es: Putting down the palanquin from their shoulders on the lonely spot, the bearers stood in tearswaiting.

data.v: ततस्तारा पतिं दृष्ट्वा शिबिकातलशायिनम् । आरोप्याङ्के शिरस्तस्य विललाप सुदुःखिता ।।
data.es: Seeing her husband lying in the palanquin, Tara, full of grief placed Vali's head on her lap and cried.

data.v: जनं च पश्यसीमं त्वं कस्माच्छोकाभिपीडितम् । प्रहृष्टमिव ते वक्त्रं गतासोरपि मानद । अस्तार्कसमवर्णं च लक्ष्यते जीवतो यथा ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: जरमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यससभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: यजतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरनम]

data.es: 'O revered self even though you are bereft of life, your face looks cheerful. It carries the colour of the setting Sun, and looks the same when you were alive.

data.v: एष त्वां रामरूपेण कालः कर्षति वानर । येन स्म विधवाः सर्वाः कृता एकेषुणा रणे ।।
data.es: 'O monkey a single arrow from Rama who appeared in the forest in the form of death dragged you away from us and turned us all into widows.

data.v: इमास्तास्तव राजेन्द्रवानर्यो वल्लभाः सदा । पादैर्विकृष्टमध्वानमागताः किं न बुध्यसे ।।
data.es: 'O king of kings why don't you understand that these female monkeys, your wives who were dear to you have come on foot this long distance with great difficulty?

data.v: तवेष्टा ननु नामैता भार्याश्चन्द्रनिभाननाः । इदानीं नेक्षसे कस्मात्सुग्रीवं प्लवगेश्वरम् ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys these moonfaced wives were indeed once your favourites. Why don't you look at them? Why don't you look Sugriva?

data.v: एते हि सचिवा राजंस्तारप्रभृतयस्तव । पुरवासिजनश्चायं परिवार्यासतेऽनघ ।।
data.es: 'O king O sinless hero Tara and others, your ministers as well as the inhabitants of the capital are here sitting around you.

data.v: विसर्जयैनान्प्रवलान्यथोचितमरिंदम । ततः क्रीडामहे सर्वा वनेषु मदिरोत्कटाः ।।
data.es: 'O conqueror of enemies give these monkeys their due in accordance with their status and send them back as you used to do when they were passionately sporting in your company here in this forest.

data.v: एवं विलपतीं तारां पतिशोकपरिप्लुताम् । उत्थापयन्ति स्म तदा वानर्यः शोककर्शिताः ।।
data.es: The griefstricken female monkeys helped Tara, overwhelmed with sorrow due to her husband's death, rise from the ground.

data.v: सुग्रीवेण ततः सार्धमङ्गदः पितरं रुदन् । चितामारोपयामास शोकेनाभिहतेन्द्रियः ।।
data.es: Then Angada, helped by Sugriva, placed his father's body on the pyre, with his senses numbed in deep sorrow.

data.v: ततोऽग्निं विधिवद्दत्त्वा सोऽपसव्यं चकार ह । पितरं दीर्घमध्वानं प्रस्थितं व्याकुलेन्द्रियः ।।
data.es: Overwhelmed with sorrow, he offered fire to the father who had set out on a long journey (to heaven). As per tradition he went round the pyre anteclock wise.

data.v: संस्कृत्य वालिनं ते तु विधिपूर्वं प्लवंगमाः । आजग्मुरुदकं कर्तुं नदीं शीतजलां शुभाम् ।।
data.es: The monkeys set Vali's body to be consumed by fire as per tradition and proceeded to an auspicious river of pure water in order to offer oblation (to the departed soul).

data.v: ततस्ते सहितास्तत्र अङ्गदं स्थाप्य चाग्रतः । सुग्रीवतारासहिताः सिषिचुर्वालिने जलम् ।।
data.es: Then the monkeys along with Sugriva and Tara positioning Angada in the forefront made waterofferings (to Vali) collectively.

data.v: सुग्रीवेणैव दीनेन दीनो भूत्वा महाबलः । समानशोकः काकुत्स्थः प्रेतकार्याण्यकारयत् ।।
data.es: Mighty Rama, who was equally sorrowful and pitiable as Sugriva, directed the performance of funeral rites.

data.v: ततः शोकाभिसंतप्तं सुग्रीवं क्लिन्नवासनम् । शाखामृगमहामात्राः परिवार्योपतस्थिरे ।।
data.es: Then the chiefs of the army of the monkeys surrounded Sugriva, who was overcome with grief and was still in wet clothes (since he had taken bath at the conclusion of the funeral rites) and waited.

data.v: अभिगम्य महाबाहुं राममक्लिष्टकारिणम् । स्थिताः प्राञ्जलयः सर्वे पितामहमिवर्षयः ।।
data.es: Just like sages stand before the creator Brahma, all the monkeys stood with folded hands before the longarmed Rama, the remover of sorrow.

data.v: ततः काञ्चनशैलाभस्तरुणार्कनिभाननः । अब्रवीत्प्राञ्जलिर्वाक्यं हनुमान्मारुतात्मजः ।।
data.es: On hearing the words of Rama in deep distress, the monkey replied to him with folded hands, his throat choked with tears:

data.v: भवत्प्रसादात्सुग्रीवः पितृपैतामहं महत् । वानराणां सुदुष्प्रापं प्राप्तो राज्यमिदं प्रभो ।।
data.es: 'O Lord by your grace Sugriva inherited the ancestral kingdom which would have been otherwise difficult.

data.v: भवता समनुज्ञातः प्रविश्य नगरं शुभम् । संविधास्यति कार्याणि सर्वाणि ससुहृज्जनः ।।
data.es: 'Permitted by your gracious self, he will enter the auspicious city along with his friends and perform his duties. He had his auspicious bath in fragrant waters with medicinal herbs as per tradition.

data.v: स्नातोऽयं विविधैर्गन्धैरौषधैश्च यथाविधि । अर्चयिष्यति रत्नैश्च माल्यैश्च त्वां विशेषतः ।।
इमां गिरिगुहां रम्यामभिगन्तुमितोऽर्हसि । कुरुष्व स्वामि संबन्धं वानरान्संप्रहर्षयन् ।।
data.es: 'He wants to propitiate you first specially with garlands and gems. Pray enter this beautiful mountain cave for the pleasure of the monkeys and establish relationship with king Sugriva.'

data.v: एवमुक्तो हनुमता राघवः परवीरहा । प्रत्युवाच हनूमन्तं बुद्धिमान्वाक्यकोविदः ।।
data.es: Requested by Hanuman who was skilful in conversation, wise Rama, slayer of enemies, replied:

data.v: चतुर्दशसमाः सौम्य ग्रामं वा यदि वा पुरम् । न प्रवेक्ष्यामि हनुमन्पितुर्निर्देशपालकः ।।
data.es: 'Dear Hanuman In obedience to my father's command I should not enter any village or city for fourteen years.

data.v: सुसमृद्धां गुहां दिव्यां सुग्रीवो वानरर्षभः । प्रविष्टो विधिवद्वीरः क्षिप्रं राज्येऽभिषिच्यताम् ।।
data.es: 'Let Sugriva enter the beautiful prosperous cavern (Kishkinda) and be installed by you as king with due rituals.'

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा हनूमन्तं रामः सुग्रीवमब्रवीत् । इममप्यङ्गदं वीर यौवराज्येऽभिषेचय ।।
data.es: Having thus spoken to Hanuman, Rama who knew etiquette addressed mighty Sugriva, endowed with wisdom:

data.v: पूर्वोऽयं वार्षिको मासः श्रावणः सलिलागमः । प्रवृत्ताः सौम्य चत्वारो मासा वार्षिकसंज्ञिताः ।।
data.es: 'O noble Sugriva the four months from now will be rainy season. This is Sravana, the first month of the season in which rain is expected to start pouring.

data.v: नायमुद्योगसमयः प्रविश त्वं पुरीं शुभाम् । अस्मिन्वत्स्याम्यहं सौम्य पर्वते सहलक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: 'O goodnatured Sugriva this is not a suitable time for any endeavour. Go to the auspicious capital city of Kishkinda and I will reside on the mountain with Lakshmana.

data.v: इयं गिरिगुहा रम्या विशाला युक्तमारुता । प्रभूतसलिला सौम्य प्रभूतकमलोत्पला ।।
data.es: 'Dear Sugriva this cavern of the mountain is large and airy. It has abundant water resources with lotuses and lilies.

data.v: कार्तिके समनुप्राप्ते त्वं रावणवधे यत । एष नः समयः सौम्य प्रविश त्वं स्वमालयम् । अभिषिञ्चस्व राज्ये च सुहृदः संप्रहर्षय ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यनतभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: सरजज], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसमभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जजभत]

data.es: 'Enter the city and get yourself installed and cheer your friends. Make all arrangement for killing Ravana when the month of Kartika begins as it is the proper time (for the purpose).

data.v: इति रामाभ्यनुज्ञातः सुग्रीवो वानरर्षभः । प्रविवेश पुरीं रम्यां किष्किन्धां वालिपालिताम् ।।
data.es: Thus permitted by Rama , Sugriva, lord of the monkeys entered the beautiful city of Kishkinda (once) ruled by Vali.

data.v: तं वानरसहस्राणि प्रविष्टं वानरेश्वरम् । अभिवाद्य प्रहृष्टानि सर्वतः पर्यवारयन् ।।
data.es: Thousands of monkeys entered the city of Kishkinda along with their king, and stood in attendance everywhere.

data.v: ततः प्रकृतयः सर्वा दृष्ट्वा हरिगणेश्वरम् । प्रणम्य मूर्ध्ना पतिता वसुधायां समाहिताः ।।
data.es: Then all the subjects of the city collected together, prostrated to the chief of the monkey clan with their forehead touching the ground (as a mark of respect) and sat down.

data.v: सुग्रीवः प्रकृतीः सर्वाः संभाष्योत्थाप्य वीर्यवान् । भ्रातुरन्तःपुरं सौम्यं प्रविवेश महाबलः ।।
data.es: Asking the monkeys to rise to their feet, the mighty and powerful Sugriva entered the inner chambers of his brother.

data.v: प्रविश्य त्वभिनिष्क्रान्तं सुग्रीवं वानरर्षभम् । अभ्यषिञ्चन्त सुहृदः सहस्राक्षमिवामराः ।।
data.es: With Sugriva,the lord of the monkeys, returned to Kishkinda, his kith and kin coronated him just as the gods consecrated the thousandeyed Indra.

data.v: तस्य पाण्डुरमाजह्रुश्छत्रं हेमपरिष्कृतम् । शुक्ले च बालव्यजने हेमदण्डे यशस्करे ।।
तथा सर्वाणि रत्नानि सर्वबीजौषधानि च । सक्षीराणां च वृक्षाणां प्ररोहान्कुसुमानि च ।।
शुक्लानि चैव वस्त्राणि श्वेतं चैवानुलेपनम् । सुगन्धीनि च माल्यानि स्थलजान्यम्बुजानि च ।।
चन्दनानि च दिव्यानि गन्धांश्च विविधान्बहून् । अक्षतं जातरूपं च प्रियङ्गुमधुसर्पिषी ।।
दधिचर्म च वैयाघ्रं वाराही चाप्युपानहौ । समालम्भनमादाय रोचनां समनःशिलाम् । आजग्मुस्तत्र मुदिता वराः कन्यास्तु षोडश ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: नरतभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: ससमम], अज्ञातम् [१२: रसयत], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरभत]

data.v: ततस्ते वानरश्रेष्ठं यथाकालं यथाविधि । रत्नैर्वस्त्रैश्च भक्ष्यैश्च तोषयित्वा द्विजर्षभान् ।।
data.es: Then they duly propitiated the brahmins, offering them gifts of gems, clothes and eatables.

data.v: ततः कुशपरिस्तीर्णं समिद्धं जातवेदसं । मन्त्रपूतेन हविषा हुत्वा मन्त्रविदो जनाः ।।
data.es: Then the priests (people who recite Vedic hymns) strew around kusa grass, kindled sacred fire with recitation of mantras and made offerings of havis into the fire.

data.v: ततो हेमप्रतिष्ठाने वरास्तरणसंवृते । प्रासादशिखरे रम्ये चित्रमाल्योपशोभिते ।।
प्राङ्मुखं विविधैर्मन्त्रैः स्थापयित्वा वरासने । नदीनदेभ्यः संहृत्य तीर्थेभ्यश्च समन्ततः ।।
आहृत्य च समुद्रेभ्यः सर्वेभ्यो वानरर्षभाः । अपः कनककुम्भेषु निधाय विमलाः शुभाः ।।
शुभैर्वृषभशृङ्गैश्च कलशैश्चापि काञ्चनैः । शास्त्रदृष्टेन विधिना महर्षिविहितेन च ।।
गजो गवाक्षो गवयः शरभो गन्धमादनः । मैन्दश्च द्विविदश्चैव हनूमाञ्जाम्बवान्नलः ।।
अभ्यषिञ्चन्त सुग्रीवं प्रसन्नेन सुगन्धिना । सलिलेन सहस्राक्षं वसवो वासवं यथा ।।
अभिषिक्ते तु सुग्रीवे सर्वे वानरपुंगवाः । प्रचुक्रुशुर्महात्मानो हृष्टास्तत्र सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: As Sugriva was ceremoniously consecrated, thousands of monkeys rejoiced and shrieked out of joy.

data.es: Seeing Rama worried and engrossed in endless sorrow, his brother Lakshmana who was equally sad spoke these words of consolation:

data.es: 'O heroic one, you know one who broods fails to achieve his objective. So do not brood.

data.es: 'Root out sorrow. Be daring. Be firm in resolve. (Only) then can you destroy the demon and his family.

data.es: 'O Kakutstha, you can turn the earth with its oceans, forests and mountains, what to speak of Ravana.

data.es: 'I am only awakening your dormant valour as one would kindle the fire covered with ashes by making offerings.'

data.es: On hearing the good counsel and auspicious words of Lakshmana, Rama spoke these loving and warm words:

data.es: 'O Sugriva you have done what a friend should have done in a befitting manner with your sweet words and good wishes.

data.es: 'This sorrow which dampens one's daring spirit is given up. I shall now resort to such undaunted valour during my heroic exploits.

data.es: 'This is the rainy season.Wait for autumn.Thereafter you will destroy Ravana along with his kingdom and clan.

data.es: 'Dundubhi whose eyes turned red in anger when he heard the words of Vali ,the wise king of the monkeys, said:

data.es: The clouds that resemble high mountain peaks, having their banners of lightning with rows of herons as garlands give out loud peals of thunder like elephants in rut trumpet in battlearray.

data.es: 'Sleep steals over Lord Visnu. The rivers run swiftly to the sea, the female herons fly to catch the clouds joyfully. The young bride eagerly approaches her dear lord. (It is believed that Lord Visnu goes to sleep during chaturmasya, ie. from Asarh to Kartik)

data.v: जाता वनान्ताः शिखिसुप्रनृत्ता; जाताः कदम्बाः सकदम्बशाखाः । जाता वृषा गोषु समानकामा; जाता मही सस्यवनाभिरामा ।।
data.es: 'Peacocks dance in the forest. The branches of the kadamba trees get filled with flowers. Bulls long for union with the cows. The earth looks beautiful with green crops and trees.

data.v: वहन्ति वर्षन्ति नदन्ति भान्ति; ध्यायन्ति नृत्यन्ति समाश्वसन्ति । नद्यो घना मत्तगजा वनान्ताः; प्रियाविनीहाः शिखिनः प्लवंगाः ।।
data.es: 'The clouds are raining. The rivers are flowing. Proud elephants are trumpeting. Those separated from their loved ones are brooding. The monkeys are quiet and the peacocks are dancing.

data.v: प्रहर्षिताः केतकपुष्पगन्ध;माघ्राय हृष्टा वननिर्झरेषु । प्रपात शब्दाकुलिता गजेन्द्राः; सार्धं मयूरैः समदा नदन्ति ।।
data.es: 'The lordly elephants get intoxicated with the fragrance of ketaki flowers, the noise of waterfalls and the cackle of peacocks and they give out a shrill trumpet.

data.v: धारानिपातैरभिहन्यमानाः; कदम्बशाखासु विलम्बमानाः । क्षणार्जितं पुष्परसावगाढं; शनैर्मदं षट्चरणास्त्यजन्ति ।।
data.es: 'Having sucked honey from the flowercups filled with honey, the bees are shedding their drunkenness slowly and hanging on the branches of kadamba trees, smitten with showers.

data.v: अङ्गारचूर्णोत्करसंनिकाशैः; फलैः सुपर्याप्त रसैः समृद्धैः । जम्बूद्रुमाणां प्रविभान्ति शाखा; निलीयमाना इव षट्पदौघैः ।।
data.es: 'The branches of jambu trees profusely filled with fruits appear like piled up balls of charcoal, while swarms of bees rest on the branches on the jambu trees.

data.v: तडित्पताकाभिरलंकृताना;मुदीर्णगम्भीरमहारवाणाम् । विभान्ति रूपाणि बलाहकानां; रणोद्यतानामिव वारणानाम् ।।
data.es: 'The rainclouds decorated with banners of lightning and giving out peals of thunder shine like elephants in rut trumpeting, eager to fight in battle.

data.v: मार्गानुगः शैलवनानुसारी; संप्रस्थितो मेघरवं निशम्य । युद्धाभिकामः प्रतिनागशङ्की; मत्तो गजेन्द्रः प्रतिसंनिवृत्तः ।।
data.es: 'Intoxicated elephants on their march along the mountain in the forest, hear the thundering sounds of clouds and suspecting it to be the call of proud elephants to fight turn back.

data.v: मुक्तासकाशं सलिलं पतद्वै; सुनिर्मलं पत्रपुटेषु लग्नम् । हृष्टा विवर्णच्छदना विहंगाः; सुरेन्द्रदत्तं तृषिताः पिबन्ति ।।
data.es: 'Thirsty birds rejoice drinking exceedingly pure water held in leafcups offered by Indra (in the form of rain), which looks like pearls collected in the leafcups. As the drops fall on them the hue of their wings seems to change (fade).

data.v: नीलेषु नीला नववारिपूर्णा; मेघेषु मेघाः प्रविभान्ति सक्ताः । दवाग्निदग्धेषु दवाग्निदग्धाः; शैलेषु शैला इव बद्धमूलाः ।।
data.es: 'Dark clouds filled with fresh water, leaning on dark clouds appear like boulders of rock, scorched with wild fire with their bases yet firmly rooted shining.

data.v: मत्ता गजेन्द्रा मुदिता गवेन्द्रा; वनेषु विश्रान्ततरा मृगेन्द्राः । रम्या नगेन्द्रा निभृता नगेन्द्राः; प्रक्रीडितो वारिधरैः सुरेन्द्रः ।।
data.es: 'Intoxicated elephants roam the forest. Mighty bulls rejoice. Kings of beasts (lions) lounge. Mountains look beautiful. Kings relax. While Indra, lord of the gods, sports with clouds.

data.v: वृत्ता यात्रा नरेन्द्राणां सेना प्रतिनिवर्तते । वैराणि चैव मार्गाश्च सलिलेन समीकृताः ।।
data.es: 'Expeditions by kings come to a stop. The army returns. The flow of water blocks the roads. It suspends enmity (between states).

data.v: मासि प्रौष्ठपदे ब्रह्म ब्राह्मणानां विवक्षताम् । अयमध्यायसमयः सामगानामुपस्थितः ।।
data.es: 'The month of Bhadrapada meant for the recitation of the Vedas by brahmins and for those desirous of singing Sama Veda has started.

data.v: निवृत्तकर्मायतनो नूनं संचितसंचयः । आषाढीमभ्युपगतो भरतः कोषकाधिपः ।।
data.es: 'Surely Bharata, king of Kosala, would have completed the collection of all his requirement before the commencement of the month of Asarh.

data.v: नूनमापूर्यमाणायाः सरय्वा वधते रयः । मां समीक्ष्य समायान्तमयोध्याया इव स्वनः ।।
data.es: 'Just as the cheerful voices of people of Ayodhya rise as soon as they see me returning, certainly the speed of river Sarayu is rising, filled with rain water.

data.v: इमाः स्फीतगुणा वर्षाः सुग्रीवः सुखमश्नुते । विजितारिः सदारश्च राज्ये महति च स्थितः ।।
data.es: 'Having defeated his enemy, Sugriva with his wife during the rainy season is wellestablished in the kingdom, abounding in merits.

data.v: अहं तु हृतदारश्च राज्याच्च महतश्च्युतः । नदीकूलमिव क्लिन्नमवसीदामि लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: 'O Lakshmana I have lost my wife. I have been dethroned from the mighty kingdom. I am sinking like a river bank overflowed.

data.v: शोकश्च मम विस्तीर्णो वर्षाश्च भृशदुर्गमाः । रावणश्च महाञ्शत्रुरपारं प्रतिभाति मे ।।
data.es: 'My sorrow which increases, the rains which make it hard to cover distances and Ravana the great enemyall these appear difficult to conquer.

data.v: अयात्रां चैव दृष्ट्वेमां मार्गांश्च भृशदुर्गमान् । प्रणते चैव सुग्रीवे न मया किंचिदीरितम् ।।
अपि चातिपरिक्लिष्टं चिराद्दारैः समागतम् । आत्मकार्यगरीयस्त्वाद्वक्तुं नेच्छामि वानरम् ।।
data.es: 'Since Sugriva has gone through great difficulties and is reunited with his wives after a long time and since our task is great, I did not desire to speak to him now.

data.v: स्वयमेव हि विश्रम्य ज्ञात्वा कालमुपागतम् । उपकारं च सुग्रीवो वेत्स्यते नात्र संशयः ।।
तस्मात्कालप्रतीक्षोऽहं स्थितोऽस्मि शुभलक्षण । सुग्रीवस्य नदीनां च प्रसादमनुपालयन् ।।
data.es: 'I will wait for autumn. I will stick to your advice while I wait until Sugriva and the rivers are pleased (with moderate flow of water.)

data.v: उपकारेण वीरो हि प्रतिकारेण युज्यते । अकृतज्ञोऽप्रतिकृतो हन्ति सत्त्ववतां मनः ।।
data.es: A hero should in return help whoever has helped him. An ungrateful person hurts the heart of the virtuous by not returning the assistance.'

data.v: अथैवमुक्तः प्रणिधाय लक्ष्मणः; कृताञ्जलिस्तत्प्रतिपूज्य भाषितम् । उवाच रामं स्वभिराम दर्शनं; प्रदर्शयन्दर्शनमात्मनः शुभम् ।।
data.es: Then Lakshmana reflected upon the words of Rama thoughtfully. He honoured his brother's words by receiving his advice with folded hands and spoke to his handsome brother giving out his own views:

data.v: यथोक्तमेतत्तव सर्वमीप्सितं; नरेन्द्र कर्ता नचिराद्धरीश्वरः । शरत्प्रतीक्षः क्षमतामिमं भवा;ञ्जलप्रपातं रिपुनिग्रहे धृतः ।।
data.es: 'O lord of men, your desire will be fulfilled soon. Be determined to fight the enemy while waiting for autumn. Forgive this rainy season (and its water that obstructs).

data.v: समीक्ष्य विमलं व्योम गतविद्युद्बलाहकम् । सारसारवसंघुष्टं रम्यज्योत्स्नानुलेपनम् ।।
data.es: Looking at the sky rid of clouds and lightning, filled with the sounds of flocks of sarasa birds, Rama cried in a pitiable state.

data.v: समृद्धार्थं च सुग्रीवं मन्दधर्मार्थसंग्रहम् । अत्यर्थमसतां मार्गमेकान्तगतमानसं ।।
निवृत्तकार्यं सिद्धार्थं प्रमदाभिरतं सदा । प्राप्तवन्तमभिप्रेतान्सर्वानेव मनोरथान् ।।
स्वां च पात्नीमभिप्रेतां तारां चापि समीप्सिताम् । विहरन्तमहोरात्रं कृतार्थं विगतज्वलम् ।।
क्रीडन्तमिव देवेशं नन्दनेऽप्सरसां गणैः । मन्त्रिषु न्यस्तकार्यं च मन्त्रिणामनवेक्षकम् ।।
उत्सन्नराज्यसंदेशं कामवृत्तमवस्थितम् । निश्चितार्थोऽर्थतत्त्वज्ञः कालधर्मविशेषवित् ।।
प्रसाद्य वाक्यैर्मधुरैर्हेतुमद्भिर्मनोरमैः । वाक्यविद्वाक्यतत्त्वज्ञं हरीशं मारुतात्मजः ।।
हितं तथ्यं च पथ्यं च सामधर्मार्थनीतिमत् । प्रणयप्रीतिसंयुक्तं विश्वासकृतनिश्चयम् । हरीश्वरमुपागम्य हनुमान्वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यनतर], अज्ञातम् [१२: जभतम], अज्ञातम् [१२: यररय], अज्ञातम् [१२: तसजभ]

data.v: राज्यं प्राप्तं यशश्चैव कौली श्रीरभिवर्थिता । मित्राणां संग्रहः शेषस्तद्भवान्कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: 'You have attained the kingdom. You have earned fame. The prosperity of your family has gone up. All that remains is to earn the goodwill of friends. Attend to that now.

data.v: यो हि मित्रेषु कालज्ञः सततं साधु वर्तते । तस्य राज्यं च कीर्तिश्च प्रतापश्चाभिवर्धते ।।
data.es: 'The kingdom, glory and fame of a king who knows the value of time and conducts himself well towards his allies always grows.

data.v: यस्य कोशश्च दण्डश्च मित्राण्यात्मा च भूमिप । समवेतानि सर्वाणि स राज्यं महदश्नुते ।।
data.es: 'He to whom the treasury, sceptre, allies and his own self all these are equally dear, enjoys a large kingdom.

data.v: तद्भवान्वृत्तसंपन्नः स्थितः पथि निरत्यये । मित्रार्थमभिनीतार्थं यथावत्कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: 'Endowed with right conduct, you ought to duly answer the cause of your ally conforming to proper course of action.

data.v: यस्तु कालव्यतीतेषु मित्रकार्येषु वर्तते । स कृत्वा महतोऽप्यर्थान्न मित्रार्थेन युज्यते ।।
data.es: 'He who exceeds the time limit in accomplishing a friend's task, and puts forth great effort later succeeds not.

data.v: क्रियतां राघवस्यैतद्वैदेह्याः परिमार्गणम् । तदिदं वीर कार्यं ते कालातीतमरिंदम ।।
data.es: 'O subduer of enemies we should do the brave deed of finding Vaidehi for the sake of your friend. O crusher of enemies this is your duty at present and it is already delayed.

data.v: न च कालमतीतं ते निवेदयति कालवित् । त्वरमाणोऽपि सन्प्राज्ञस्तव राजन्वशानुगः ।।
data.es: 'O king a wise man (like Rama) who is aware of timely action would not tell you even if it is unduly delayed, even when he is in a hurry to get the work done, since he is staying in your kingdom (since he is dependant on you).

data.v: कुलस्य केतुः स्फीतस्य दीर्घबन्धुश्च राघवः । अप्रमेयप्रभावश्च स्वयं चाप्रतिमो गुणैः ।।
data.es: 'Rama is responsible in lending stability to you and to your wellknown family. He will continue to be your ally for a long time. Let it be known that his power is boundless and his virtues peerless.

data.v: तस्य त्वं कुरु वै कार्यं पूर्वं तेन कृतं तव । हरीश्वर हरिश्रेष्ठानाज्ञापयितुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: 'O king pray accomplish his object the same way he has accomplished your own. You ought to issue orders to the foremost of the monkeys.

data.v: न हि तावद्भवेत्कालो व्यतीतश्चोदनादृते । चोदितस्य हि कार्यस्य भवेत्कालव्यतिक्रमः ।।
data.es: 'Time will not be deemed lapsed in vain if the work is sincerely taken up without delay and without pressure from your ally, Rama. If it is undertaken under pressure, it will be considered transgression of time.

data.v: अकर्तुरपि कार्यस्य भवान्कर्ता हरीश्वर । किं पुनः प्रतिकर्तुस्ते राज्येन च धनेन च ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys help even a person who has not helped you. As such, do you need to be told that you should help one, with whose help you have earned wealth and kingdom?

data.v: शक्तिमानसि विक्रान्तो वानरर्ष्क गणेश्वर । कर्तुं दाशरथेः प्रीतिमाज्ञायां किं नु सज्जसे ।।
data.es: 'O protector of the monkeys, you are powerful and you are prompt. Why don't you issue orders which will please Rama?

data.v: कामं खलु शरैर्शक्तः सुरासुरमहोरगान् । वशे दाशरथिः कर्तुं त्वत्प्रतिज्ञां तु काङ्क्षते ।।
data.es: 'Indeed, Rama is fully capable of subduing gods, demons as well as nagas with his arrows. He is looking for your help in view of your promise.

data.v: प्राणत्यागाविशङ्केन कृतं तेन तव प्रियम् । तस्य मार्गाम वैदेहीं पृथिव्यामपि चाम्बरे ।।
data.es: 'He has done you a deed dear to you without hesitation, risking his own life.Let us help him in search of his Vaidehi whether she is on earth or in heaven.

data.v: न देवा न च गन्धर्वा नासुरा न मरुद्गणाः । न च यक्षा भयं तस्य कुर्युः किमुत राक्षसाः ।।
data.es: 'Not gods, demons, gandharvas or even marutas, suras or yakshas can cause fright in him much less the rakshasas.

data.v: तदेवं शक्तियुक्तस्य पूर्वं प्रियकृतस्तथा । रामस्यार्हसि पिङ्गेश कर्तुं सर्वात्मना प्रियम् ।।
data.es: 'Therefore, O king of monkeys you ought to oblige Rama wholeheartedly exerting all your strength, as he has done your work.

data.v: नाधस्तादवनौ नाप्सु गतिर्नोपरि चाम्बरे । कस्यचित्सज्जतेऽस्माकं कपीश्वर तवाज्ञया ।।
data.es: 'O lord of monkeys commanded by you, each one of us or all of us together can ransack the underworld, the earth, or water or heaven.

data.v: तदाज्ञापय कः किं ते कृते वसतु कुत्रचित् । हरयो ह्यप्रधृष्यास्ते सन्ति कोट्यग्रतोऽनघ ।।
data.es: O sinless hero therefore issue your command. There are more than a crore of invincible monkeys. Determine now who should do and what and in which place. We are at your service'.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा काले साधुनिवेदितम् । सुग्रीवः सत्त्वसंपन्नश्चकार मतिमुत्तमाम् ।।
data.es: Sugriva who had a great sense of duty, started applying his mind, when he heard the honest advice of Hanuman.

data.v: स संदिदेशाभिमतं नीलं नित्यकृतोद्यमम् । दिक्षु सर्वासु सर्वेषां सैन्यानामुपसंग्रहे ।।
data.es: He sent word to the ever diligent Nila, his favourite, to collect all cadres of army of the monkeys from all directions.

data.v: यथा सेना समग्रा मे यूथपालाश्च सर्वशः । समागच्छन्त्यसंगेन सेनाग्राणि तथा कुरु ।।
data.es: 'Let the entire army with leaders of different groups assemble here seperately. O chief of army act accordingly.

data.v: ये त्वन्तपालाः प्लवगाः शीघ्रगा व्यवसायिनः । समानयन्तु ते सैन्यं त्वरिताः शासनान्मम । स्वयं चानन्तरं सैन्यं भवानेवानुपश्यतु ।।

ch.n: उपजाति जगती: अज्ञातम् [१२: यरतभ], अज्ञातम् [१२: जरजम], अज्ञातम् [१२: ततयज], अज्ञातम् [१२: सरजत]

data.es: 'Let the swiftfooted monkeys, guardians of frontiers, army chiefs muster soon in obedience to my command. You (Nila) alone should personally supervise the work to be done next.

data.v: त्रिपञ्चरात्रादूर्ध्वं यः प्राप्नुयान्नेह वानरः । तस्य प्राणान्तिको दण्डो नात्र कार्या विचारणा ।।
हरींश्च वृद्धानुपयातु साङ्गदो; भवान्ममाज्ञामधिकृत्य निश्चिताम् । इति व्यवस्थां हरिपुंगवेश्वरो; विधाय वेश्म प्रविवेश वीर्यवान् ।।

data.es: 'Rama's anger is purely out of love for you. He has sent Lakshmana, a bestower of prosperity to you. There is no doubt about it.

data.v: त्वं प्रमत्तो न जानीषे कालं कलविदां वर । फुल्लसप्तच्छदश्यामा प्रवृत्ता तु शरच्छिवा ।।
data.es: 'You knows best the passage of time (changing seasons). But you are not aware out of inattention that the auspicious autumn has set in, making the garden lush green with blossoms of Saptachada flowers.

data.es: 'The sky from which the dark clouds have completely disappeared is illumined with planets and stars. The rivers and tanks as well as all directions are pleasant.

data.es: 'O chief of monkeys it is time for military expeditions. Since you are intoxicated you are not aware of this, Lakshmana has come here evidently for this.

data.es: 'The message sent by a man who is in distress, and is deprived of his wife should be accepted even if they are harsh since he is a great self (who has rendered you help).

data.es: 'In these circumstances the best way is seeking apology from Lakshmana with folded hands. I do not see any way other than this.

data.es: 'The counsellors and ministers appointed by a king should certainly give good advice, without fear. This I tell you since I have faith in my words.

data.es: 'He who deserves propitiation, should not be offended, more so by a grateful man, remembering the help received by him earlier.

data.es: 'O great king Go at once with your son and relations, salute him now and avert his anger'.

data.es: 'O king of monkeys It is not right for you to overlook the commands of Rama or Lakshmana even in mind. You know the superhuman virtues of Rama, particularly his valour. data.v: अथ प्रतिसमादिष्टो लक्ष्मणः परवीरहा । प्रविवेश गुहां घोरां किष्किन्धां रामशासनात् ।।
data.es: Instructed by Rama, and having been permitted, Lakshmana, the slayer of enemies entered the frightful cave of Kishkinda.

data.v: द्वारस्था हरयस्तत्र महाकाया महाबलाः । बभूवुर्लक्ष्मणं दृष्ट्वा सर्वे प्राञ्जलयः स्थिताः ।।
data.es: Seeing Lakshmana, the huge and mighty monkey gatekeepers stood at the entrance and greeted him with folded hands.

data.v: निःश्वसन्तं तु तं दृष्ट्वा क्रुद्धं दशरथात्मजम् । बभूवुर्हरयस्त्रस्ता न चैनं पर्यवारयन् ।।
data.es: The monkeys kept away out of fear to see the son of Dasaratha, who was angry and sighing deeply.

data.v: स तं रत्नमयीं श्रीमान्दिव्यां पुष्पितकाननाम् । रम्यां रत्नसमाकीर्णां ददर्श महतीं गुहाम् ।।
data.es: Lakshmana, the bestower of fortune, saw the mammoth cave inlaid with gems and precious stones and forests full of delightful flowers.

data.v: हर्म्यप्रासादसंबाधां नानापण्योपशोभिताम् । सर्वकामफलैर्वृक्षैः पुष्पितैरुपशोभिताम् ।।
data.es: The palace was thronged with elevated mansions and illumined with jewels of all kinds. The trees were in bloom and the fruits satisfied every one's wish.It was splendid.

data.v: देवगन्धर्वपुत्रैश्च वानरैः कामरूपिभिः । दिव्य माल्याम्बरधारैः शोभितां प्रियदर्शनैः ।।
data.es: The inhabitants of Kishkinda being sons of gods and gandharvas, were of beautiful appearance wearing wonderful garlands. They could change their form at their free will. They were delightful.

data.v: चन्दनागरुपद्मानां गन्धैः सुरभिगन्धिनाम् । मैरेयाणां मधूनां च संमोदितमहापथाम् ।।
data.es: The royal roads were filled with fragrant unguents, like sandal, agaru and lotus incenses, finesmelling honey of several kinds and happy inhabitants.

data.v: विन्ध्यमेरुगिरिप्रस्थैः प्रासादैर्नैकभूमिभिः । ददर्श गिरिनद्यश्च विमलास्तत्र राघवः ।।
data.es: Lakshmana saw tall buildings comparable to Vindhya and Meru mountains and pure water flowing from the mountain streams.

data.v: अङ्गदस्य गृहं रम्यं मैन्दस्य द्विविदस्य च । गवयस्य गवाक्षस्य गजस्य शरभस्य च ।।
विद्युन्मालेश्च संपातेः सूर्याक्षस्य हनूमतः । वीरबाहोः सुबाहोश्च नलस्य च महात्मनः ।।
कुमुदस्य सुषेणस्य तारजाम्बवतोस्तथा । दधिवक्त्रस्य नीलस्य सुपाटलसुनेत्रयोः ।।
एतेषां कपिमुख्यानां राजमार्गे महात्मनाम् । ददर्श गृहमुख्यानि महासाराणि लक्ष्मणः ।।
पाण्डुराभ्रप्रकाशानि दिव्यमाल्ययुतानि च । प्रभूतधनधान्यानि स्त्रीरत्नैः शोभितानि च ।।
data.es: These homes were shining like white clouds, with wonderful garlands hung on, filled with abundance of wealth, grains and best of females.

data.v: पाण्डुरेण तु शैलेन परिक्षिप्तं दुरासदम् । वानरेन्द्रगृहं रम्यं महेन्द्रसदनोपमम् ।।
शुल्कैः प्रासादशिखरैः कैलासशिखरोपमैः । सर्वकामफलैर्वृक्षैः पुष्टितैरुपशोभितम् ।।
data.es: The palace was thronged with elevated mansions and illumined with jewels of all kinds. The trees were in bloom and the fruits satisfied every one's wish.It was splendid.

हरिभिः संवृतद्वारं बलिभिः शस्त्रपाणिभिः । दिव्यमाल्यावृतं शुभ्रं तप्तकाञ्चनतोरणम् ।।

स सप्त कक्ष्या धर्मात्मा यानासनसमावृताः । प्रविश्य सुमहद्गुप्तं ददर्शान्तःपुरं महत् ।।
data.es: Righteous Lakshmana crossed the seven enclosures filled with different kinds of people and saw a great harem full of several bright gold and silver cots, excellent seats here and there with best of cushions spread.

data.v: हैमराजतपर्यङ्कैर्बहुभिश्च वरासनैः । महार्हास्तरणोपेतैस्तत्र तत्रोपशोभितम् ।।
data.es: Righteous Lakshmana crossed the seven enclosures filled with different kinds of people and saw a great harem full of several bright gold and silver cots, excellent seats here and there with best of cushions spread.

data.v: प्रविशन्नेव सततं शुश्राव मधुरस्वरम् । तन्त्रीगीतसमाकीर्णं समगीतपदाक्षरम् ।।
data.es: As he entered, he heard melodious sounds of string instruments and music worded to metre with different kinds of tunes.

data.v: बह्वीश्च विविधाकारा रूपयौवनगर्विताः । स्त्रियः सुग्रीवभवने ददर्श स महाबलः ।।
data.es: Powerful Lakshmana saw many females of different forms proud of their youth and charm at the palace of Sugriva.

data.es: Lakshmana saw women with a good lineage adorned with colourful flower garlands and choicest ornaments engaged in making garlands and arranging fruits. He also saw at Sugriva's palace attendants, gentle, welldressed, contented and not too busy.
